Summary: Strange creature in picture of my wife playing flute while camping!
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were camping near Salida, Co on July 24th 2009. I took 3 photos of this creature by the fire. I didn���t see the creature until later that night! You can see it has an arm sticking out of left side in all 3 photos. Not sure what it is? A few minutes later we saw a huge white light in the sky moving towards us! It vanished very slowly. It came from the top of the mountain. We were in a very remote camping spot accessible to 4x4 only. I took photos of the object and it looks like a worm like white light.
